title: Bronze bar

properties.name: description
properties.value: A bronze bar is a bar of refined bronze. It can be created through the Smithing skill at level 1 by using a copper ore and a tin ore on a furnace, granting 6.2 Smithing experience. A bronze bar can be smithed on an anvil through the Smithing skill to create bronze weapons and armour. A list of bronze items that can be smithed from bronze bars and the Smithing levels required can be found here. When smithed, each bar gives 12.5 experience, with a maximum of 62.5 experience given for the bronze platebody.

Item ID2349

A bronze bar is a bar of refined bronze. It can be created through the Smithing skill at level 1 by using a copper ore and a tin ore on a furnace, granting 6.2 Smithing experience. A bronze bar can be smithed on an anvil through the Smithing skill to create bronze weapons and armour. A list of bronze items that can be smithed from bronze bars and the Smithing levels required can be found here. When smithed, each bar gives 12.5 experience, with a maximum of 62.5 experience given for the bronze platebody.

Currently, smelting a bronze bar yields a profit of 83.

Members can purchase bronze bars Shantay Pass Shop at the Shantay Pass south of Al-Kharid for 8gp each or from Jiminua's Jungle Store north of Tai Bwo Wannai village for 12gp each.

4-6 bronze bars are required for quests. Observatory Quest requires 1, The Tourist Trap requires 1-3 (dependent on your luck), Prince Ali Rescue requires 1 and One Small Favour requires 1. Furthermore, Creature of Fenkenstrain requires 3 bronze wires.

[[File:Bronze bar detail.png|left|130x200px]]
A '''bronze bar''' is a bar of refined [[bronze]]. It can be created through the [[Smithing]] skill at level 1 by using a [[copper ore]] and a [[tin ore]] on a [[furnace]], granting 6.2 Smithing [[experience]]. A bronze bar can be smithed on an [[anvil]] through the Smithing skill to create [[bronze weapons]] and [[bronze armour|armour]]. A list of bronze items that can be smithed from bronze bars and the Smithing levels required can be found [[Smithing#Bronze smithing table|here]]. When smithed, each bar gives 12.5 experience, with a maximum of 62.5 experience given for the [[bronze platebody]].

Currently, smelting a bronze bar yields a profit of {{Coins|{{GEP|Bronze bar}}-({{GEP|Copper ore}} + {{GEP|Tin ore}}) }}.

[[Members]] can purchase bronze bars [[Shantay Pass Shop]] at the [[Shantay Pass]] south of [[Al-Kharid]] for 8gp each or from [[Jiminua's Jungle Store]] north of [[Tai Bwo Wannai]] village for 12gp each.

4-6 bronze bars are required for [[quests]]. [[Observatory Quest]] requires 1, [[The Tourist Trap]] requires 1-3 (dependent on your luck), [[Prince Ali Rescue]] requires 1 and [[One Small Favour]] requires 1. Furthermore, [[Creature of Fenkenstrain]] requires 3 bronze wires.
